review: This is an excellent product. Quick response, beautiful pictures. You can download any 3rd party apps such as YouTube. For most of the users, setting up should not be a problem, but let me share some tips.- Check your TVs if they are HDCP-compatible before ordering (HDCP = short for High-bandwidth Digital Content Protection). Some old models may not have HDCP.http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/High-bandwidth_Digital_Content_Protection- If you have a Kindle account (or any other digital contents), check the country setting, which can be checked via your PC. For example, if your account is tied with co.jp, you wound not be able to watch any movies (music may be OK even in that case since it has a different contents management policy). You need to change the country to the US.At first I could not watch any movies due to the second issue, but could finally identify the root cause with the aid of the great customer support of Amazon.
